name: Miriam Pena
bio: Miriam loves to architect scalable, high performance, high concurrency, and high availability systems. Bonus point if they are written in Erlang/Elixir. She is a founder and Board member of the Erlang Ecosystem Foundation, a Staff Engineer at NextRoll, designing critical parts of their AdServers infrastructure and organizer of the Erlang and Elixir meetup in San Francisco. Prior to AdRoll, she provided Erlang specialized consultancy and studied Computer Science Engineering from La Coru√±a University in Spain. Voted one of the women to watch in 2018 by Women 2.0.
